subject: Figure Skating
Ice Skating
lead_paragraph: The former world champion Daisuke Takahashi of Japan crashed while attempting a quadruple flip but recovered to win the NHK Trophy in Sapporo, Japan, and earn a place in the Grand Prix final.
snippet: The former world champion Daisuke Takahashi of Japan crashed while attempting a quadruple flip but recovered to win the NHK Trophy in Sapporo, Japan, and earn a place in the Grand Prix final.
